content: On the evening of June 18, after the Chinese Super League match between Meizhou Hakka and Shanghai Port, fans at the Meizhou Hakka home stadium surrounded the referee because they questioned the referee's decision to record Shanghai Port's handball as a valid goal.

content:
"Chinese Doctor"
Yu Li, a teacher at Southern Medical University who was punished for being late for class due to rescuing a sick child, has been suspended from the hospital after being widely reported by the media.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
@wuaobei I am more inclined to believe that they are deliberately directing the topic of public opinion to international students.
Because in fact, whether Chinese or international students, if the teacher does not show up at the class time, they will definitely report and ask. And the decision on how to determine the severity of the incident and how to deal with it is all up to the school and the hospital.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
"Reproductive isolation"
The Paper reported that a survey showed that in the Northeast region, marriage within the system has become an unwritten rule. Single young people who have not entered the system, even if they have superior conditions, find it difficult to develop long-term intimate relationships with single young people within the system.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
At 8:28 on June 19, a knife attack occurred at Hechuan Station on Shanghai Metro Line 9, injuring three people. The suspect (male, 54 years old) has been arrested by the police and the case is under further investigation.
According to official news from Shanghai Metro, in order to cooperate with external disposal, Hechuan Road Station on Line 9 was temporarily closed, and operations resumed normal at around 9:16.
